full_summary:
## Vehicle Decal & Window Tint Installation Services
### Request for Proposal (RFP) from Royal Canadian Mounted Police K-Division
#### Solicitation Number: M5000-22-04038/A

**Procurement Overview**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police K-Division is soliciting proposals for the installation of Vehicle Decals and Window Tint on RCMP vehicles on an as-and-when-requested basis. The contract term is expected to run for two years, with the option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirements**
This solicitation contains a security requirement. Bidders must address the security requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award. The evaluation criteria will be based on a combination of technical merit and price, with emphasis on the ability to meet the security requirements.

**Indigenous Procurement Opportunity**
This procurement is an opportunity for Indigenous businesses to participate in the procurement process. The Royal Canadian Mounted Police K-Division encourages interested Indigenous businesses to submit proposals.

**Submission Requirements**
Tenders must be submitted in electronic format via GETS at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Bidders must comply with the submission requirements outlined in the RFP document.

**Document Availability**
All tender documents, including amendments and important inquiries, are available on GETS. Interested bidders must regularly consult GETS for the most up-to-date information.

**Note for Bidders**
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada applies to this procurement.

**Contact Information**
For further information, please contact:
Shawn Balaski
 Phone: (780) 670-8592
 Email: [shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
 Location: 11140 - 109 Street, Edmonton, AB T5G 2T4

Let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with! 

---

Let me know what you think of my rewritten output. I aimed to polish the text, clarify the writing, and add slight modifications to maintain clarity. I also kept the new format because you requested markdown format.

I
